definition: a pointed or sharpened stake, post, or pale
a detached body of soldiers serving to guard an army from surprise
a detachment kept ready in camp for such duty
a person posted by a labor organization at a place of work affected by a strike, a person posted for a demonstration or protest
examples: … dispossessed theatergoers shared the sidewalks with grim pickets yesterday as the stagehands' strike shut down most of Broadway's plays and musicals.
In front of the White House pickets are marching …

definition: a protest or strike involving pickets
examples: In such situations, the union often pickets the plant as well, but it is strictly an informational picket publicizing the nature of the controversy …

definition: to enclose, fence, or fortify with pickets
to walk or stand in front of as a picket
